name: Nilou
storytext: Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.
source: Reward for inviting Nilou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Dance of Haftkarsvar
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], if the party includes <color=#80C0FFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro Characters</color> and <color=#7EC236FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro Characters</color> and characters from no other Elements, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112081]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, if the party includes <color=#80C0FFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro Characters</color> and <color=#7EC236FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro Characters</color> and characters from no other Elements, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Golden Chalice's Bounty</color>.
skills.description: Deals 3 Hydro DMG, if the party includes Hydro Characters and Dendro Characters and characters from no other Elements, create 1 Golden Chalice's Bounty.

skills.name: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. The target character receives <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lingering Aeon</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG. The target character receives Lingering Aeon.
